entity.name: Varun Moka
entity.description: Open source developer and sustainability advocate building carbon emissions tracking solutions for global supply chain transparency and decarbonization.

project.name: GoCarbonTracker
project.description: Premium B2B consulting services (Scope 3 emissions, LCA, double materiality assessments, decarbonization strategies) fund a completely free educational platform, creating a sustainable bridge between professional sustainability and public climate education

funding.description: Transform sustainability consulting through specialized expertise while democratizing climate education through business excellence - where professional consulting success directly enables free access to enterprise-grade sustainability tools and curriculum for all

useOfFunds.description: Advanced Scope 3 tracking, LCA frameworks, double materiality assessments, CSRD compliance, enterprise consulting workflows
Free educational modules, teacher dashboards, mobile learning app, multilingual content, community forums
Infrastructure, team expansion, consulting expertise, client relationship management

milestones.title: Foundation & Scope 3 Specialization
deliverables: Advanced Scope 3 emissions tracking and calculation engines
LCA framework integration and automated reporting
Enterprise-grade data validation and audit trails
Educational platform foundation with free access tier

milestones.title: Advanced Analytics & Double Materiality
deliverables: Double materiality assessment framework and automation
AI-powered supply chain emissions hotspot identification
CSRD-compliant reporting with professional audit support
Real business case studies integrated into educational curriculum

milestones.title: Enterprise Scale & Consulting Workflow
deliverables: White-label solutions for sustainability consulting firms
Advanced LCA automation reducing delivery time by 70%
Teacher dashboard with student progress tracking

milestones.title: Educational Excellence & Community
deliverables: Community forums connecting students with professionals

revenueModel.strategy: High-value consulting engagements (€2K-25K per project) targeting European companies' complex sustainability challenges, with consulting margins funding free educational access for schools, students, and the general public
revenueModel.targetRevenue: €25K MRR by month 6 through specialized consulting services
revenueModel.sustainability: Premium consulting revenue funds completely free educational platform access

founder.name: Varun Moka
founder.expertise: B2B consulting, platform development, sustainability strategy

plannedExpansion: Educational content specialists and curriculum designers
Sustainability consulting experts for client delivery

transparency.progressTracking: Monthly progress reports published on platform
transparency.fundAllocation: Quarterly financial transparency reports with consulting revenue metrics
transparency.communityInvolvement: Open roadmap with community voting on educational features
transparency.accountability: Public milestone tracking with consulting project and educational impact verification
